name: Discrete Dipole Aproximation Project
short_description: Discrete Dipole Approximation Project, is a software package designed to solve the Discrete Dipole Problem by the Discrete Dipole Approximation (DDA) method. This software is desgined to be plugin operated allowing for easy implimincation of new solver methods to improve the efficienty of the code. The plugin support also allow the program to write its output in multiple formats and structures defined by plugins.
summary: Plugin orientated Discrete Dipole Approximation (DDA) Solver
